<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Vendor Details Form">183a503c97640210bea8b390f053af85</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:7c6a543c97640210bea8b390f053af75</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Make Attchment Mandetory</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
   
 if(newValue=='new_vendor_registration')
 {
	g_form.setMandatory('mandatory_attachment',true);
 }
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>sanuja.kulkarni</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-02-21 12:03:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>25faa0b097e40210bea8b390f053af3b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Make Attchment Mandetory</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Ordering and Procurement" source="x_1321711_ordering">c93e83a497200210bea8b390f053af2c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Ordering and Procurement">c93e83a497200210bea8b390f053af2c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_25faa0b097e40210bea8b390f053af3b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>sanuja.kulkarni</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-02-21 12:07:01</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
